mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_auth (email, auth_code, expired_at, is_verified, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{authCode}, #{expiredAt}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT auth_id AS authId, email, auth_code AS authCode, expired_at AS expiredAt, is_verified AS isVerified, created_at AS createdAt FROM email_auth WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
